Title: eNursePHR
Description: The project shows a prototype that integrates a nursing terminology (clinical care classification v2.0). It may be used to tag personal health information. Uses .NET-platform, entity framework and contains C# source. Source code also contains Silverlight-demo.
HomeWiki:
